arts.ttl: Crystal Palace enquire about signing Real Sociedad striker for January
arts.sum: It’s fair to say that the start of this season hasn’t gone as well as expected at Crystal Palace. After an end to the 2023/24 campaign that saw Oliver Glasner’s men take on all-comers, they’ve stuttered so far in 2024/25. arts.ttl: The ball boys were ‘dismissed’ by referee during Real Sociedad 0-2 Real Madrid
arts.sum: The ball boys employed for the La Liga meeting between Real Sociedad and Real Madrid were relieved of their duties during Saturday’s Anoeta matchup. As much was confirmed in referee…
